divs: Sighting DetailsAt approx. 1110 pm sitting out on back patio having coffee smoke. Patio overlooks NNE Vegas flight pattern into McCarran AP. Watching planes come in,noticed above, an orange bright light, but, no scrobes or any other light on it.Because of the color no scrobes watched it travel NE across sky observed astar ball come out of the object, but it did not fall to the ground. It keptmoving to W, maybe somewhat SW started to dim, come back bright, dim almostdisappear, come back again, dim and finally go out before my eyes. Meanwhile,planes were coming into the reg. pattern just below it. Lasted 3 to 4 minutes.Ckd clock when it went out and was 1115 pm. Then called McCarran AP was putthrough to tower, or so they said. Also, was put on hold for some time. Nothingwas reported by radar, I was told. He said Maybe you saw a UFO jokingly. Justwanted to send this in, in case you get any moree-mails on this one. Also, did see a satellite earlier moving from N to S.
Summary: Object observed above landing pattern, McCarran AP
